messages.MULTI_CURRENCY_PARTITIONED: Multiple currencies detected; results are partitioned by currency.
messages.MISSING_LISTING_FOR_PERFORMANCE_ROW: Performance row is missing listing information.

message_keys.missing_required_column: Required column "{{column}}" not found in CSV headers
message_keys.multi_currency_partitioned: Multiple currencies detected ({{currencies}}). Aggregations will be partitioned by currency.
message_keys.missing_listing_for_performance_row: Performance row ({{kind}}) has no listing name
message_keys.stay_end_not_after_start: End date ({{endDate}}) is not after Start date ({{startDate}}); stay window ignored
message_keys.nights_differs_from_date_range: Nights column ({{csvNights}}) differs from date range ({{computedNights}}); using date-computed value
message_keys.missing_paid_out_and_amount_for_payout: Payout row ({{kind}}) is missing both Paid out and Amount fields
message_keys.missing_amount_for_kind: Row ({{kind}}) is missing required Amount field
